meanings.definition: The act of giving energy or power to something.
meanings.sent1: The energizations from the sun help plants grow.
meanings.sent2: The energizations from the battery powered the flashlight.
meanings.sent3: The energizations from the coffee machine made the morning more bearable.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a burst of energizations in the room.
meanings.sent5: The energizations of the crowd at the concert were contagious.

meanings.definition: The process of becoming energized or activated.
meanings.sent1: After a good night's sleep, the energizations in his body were evident.
meanings.sent2: The energizations of the audience grew as the performance went on.
meanings.sent3: The energizations of the puppy after a nap were adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The energizations of the city came alive at night.
meanings.sent5: The energizations of the storm were felt throughout the town.
